unnest_N4_grams

unnest_N4_grams.Rd

Tokenizing the text into 4 units (Words)

Usage

unnest_N4_grams(...)

Format

A tibble with 5 variables:

id

ID of the Document

title

Title of the Document

author

Author of the Document

year

Year Published

token_four

Token Column

Arguments

...

Input in the `id` of your choice from the `Documents` dataset

Value

Mulitword combination of `4 tokens`

Examples

unnest_N4_grams(id == 3)
#> # A tibble: 73,524 × 5
#>    id    title                    author         year  token_four               
#>    <chr> <chr>                    <chr>          <chr> <chr>                    
#>  1 3     The Mysteries of Udulpho Radcliffe, Ann 1794  the mysteries of udolpho 
#>  2 3     The Mysteries of Udulpho Radcliffe, Ann 1794  a romance interspersed w…
#>  3 3     The Mysteries of Udulpho Radcliffe, Ann 1794  some pieces of poetry    
#>  4 3     The Mysteries of Udulpho Radcliffe, Ann 1794  by ann radcliffe fate    
#>  5 3     The Mysteries of Udulpho Radcliffe, Ann 1794  sits on these dark       
#>  6 3     The Mysteries of Udulpho Radcliffe, Ann 1794  battlements and frowns a…
#>  7 3     The Mysteries of Udulpho Radcliffe, Ann 1794  as the portals open      
#>  8 3     The Mysteries of Udulpho Radcliffe, Ann 1794  to receive me her        
#>  9 3     The Mysteries of Udulpho Radcliffe, Ann 1794  voice in sullen echoes   
#> 10 3     The Mysteries of Udulpho Radcliffe, Ann 1794  through the courts tells 
#> # ℹ 73,514 more rows
